name: Oh shit... run for it!
description:
This is a little game we made for new year.

Its pretty much a runner, but you can play Versus against another player, setting the obstacles the main player has to avoid.

The android build allows to check high scores online and achievements.

Controls:

Player 1

W, Up arrow - Jump

S, Down arrow - Slide

Player 2 (Versus only)

Mouse - Click on the Tile preview to place tile
